00018 #include "filterlogview.h"

00020 FilterLogView::FilterLogView( QWidget *parent, FilterLog* log )
00021   : KDialog( parent )
00022 {
00023   //save the log pointer
00024   this->log = log;
00025 
00026   //set caption
00027   setCaption( i18nc( "@title:window", "Filter Log View" ) );
00028 
00029   //main widget
00030   QWidget* pgMain = new QWidget( this );
00031   setMainWidget( pgMain );
00032 
00033   //basic layout
00034   QVBoxLayout* layMain = new QVBoxLayout();
00035   pgMain->setLayout( layMain );
00036 
00037   //view of deleted views
00038   QLabel* lblDeletedMails = new QLabel( i18nc( "@label:listbox list of deleted mails", "Deleted Mails:"), pgMain );
00039   layMain->addWidget( lblDeletedMails );
00040 
00041   lstViewDeleted = new QTreeWidget( pgMain );
00042   lstViewDeleted->setColumnCount( 4 );
00043 
00044   QStringList headersDeleted;
00045   headersDeleted.append( i18nc( "@title:column send date", "Date" ) );
00046   headersDeleted.append( i18nc( "@title:column sender of the mail", "Sender" ) );
00047   headersDeleted.append( i18nc( "@title:column account name", "Account" ) );
00048   headersDeleted.append( i18nc( "@title:column mail subject", "Subject" ) );
00049   lstViewDeleted->setHeaderLabels( headersDeleted );
00050 
00051   lstViewDeleted->setIndentation( 0 );
00052   lstViewDeleted->setAllColumnsShowFocus( true );
00053   
00054   lstViewDeleted->sortItems( 0, Qt::AscendingOrder );
00055   layMain->addWidget( lstViewDeleted );
00056 
00057   KPushButton* btnClearDeleted = new KPushButton( KStandardGuiItem::clear(), pgMain );
00058   btnClearDeleted->setToolTip( i18nc( "@info:tooltip", "Clear the list of deleted mails" ) );
00059   connect( btnClearDeleted, SIGNAL( clicked() ), this, SLOT( slotClearDeletedMails() ) );
00060   btnClearDeleted->setSizePolicy( QSizePolicy::Maximum, QSizePolicy::Fixed );
00061   layMain->addWidget( btnClearDeleted );
00062 
00063   //create a separator
00064   layMain->addWidget( new KSeparator( pgMain ) );
00065 
00066   //view of deleted views
00067   QLabel* lblMovedMails = new QLabel( i18nc( "@label:listbox list of moved mails (written into mailboxes)", "Moved Mails:"), pgMain );
00068   layMain->addWidget( lblMovedMails );
00069 
00070   lstViewMoved = new QTreeWidget( pgMain );
00071   lstViewMoved->setColumnCount( 5 );
00072 
00073   QStringList headersMoved;
00074   headersMoved.append( i18nc( "@title:column send date", "Date" ) );
00075   headersMoved.append( i18nc( "@title:column sender of the mail", "Sender" ) );
00076   headersMoved.append( i18nc( "@title:column account name", "Account" ) );
00077   headersMoved.append( i18nc( "@title:column name of the mailbox where the mail was written", "Moved To" ) );
00078   headersMoved.append( i18nc( "@title:column mail subject", "Subject" ) );
00079   lstViewMoved->setHeaderLabels( headersMoved );
00080   lstViewMoved->setIndentation( 0 );
00081   lstViewMoved->setAllColumnsShowFocus( true );
00082   layMain->addWidget( lstViewMoved );
00083 
00084   KPushButton* btnClearMoved = new KPushButton( KStandardGuiItem::clear(), pgMain );
00085   btnClearMoved->setToolTip( i18nc( "@info:tooltip", "Clear the list of moved mails" ) );
00086   connect( btnClearMoved, SIGNAL( clicked() ), this, SLOT( slotClearMovedMails() ) );
00087   btnClearMoved->setSizePolicy( QSizePolicy::Maximum, QSizePolicy::Fixed );
00088   layMain->addWidget( btnClearMoved );
00089 
00090   //now we load the content for the list views
00091   LogEntryList listDeletedMails = log->getDeletedMails();
00092   LogEntryList::iterator it;
00093   for( it = listDeletedMails.begin(); it != listDeletedMails.end(); ++it )
00094   {
00095     //create a new list view item
00096     FilterLogViewDeletedItem* item = new FilterLogViewDeletedItem( lstViewDeleted );
00097     item->setValues( (*it).getDate(), (*it).getSender(), (*it).getAccount(), (*it).getSubject() );
00098   }
00099 
00100   LogEntryList listMovedMails = log->getMovedMails();
00101   for( it = listMovedMails.begin(); it != listMovedMails.end(); ++it )
00102   {
00103     //create a new list view item
00104     FilterLogViewMovedItem* item = new FilterLogViewMovedItem( lstViewMoved );
00105     item->setValues( (*it).getDate(), (*it).getSender(), (*it).getAccount(), (*it).getMailbox(), (*it).getSubject() );
00106   }
00107 
00108   //get application config object (kshowmailrc)
00109   config = KGlobal::config();
00110 
00111   //restore Dialog Size
00112   KConfigGroup configWindowSettings( config, CONFIG_GROUP );
00113   restoreDialogSize( configWindowSettings );
00114 }
00115 
00116 
00117 FilterLogView::~FilterLogView()
00118 {
00119 }
00120 
00121 void FilterLogView::slotClearDeletedMails( )
00122 {
00123   log->clearDeletedMailsLog();
00124   lstViewDeleted->clear();
00125 
00126 }
00127 
00128 void FilterLogView::slotClearMovedMails( )
00129 {
00130   log->clearMovedMailsLog();
00131   lstViewMoved->clear();
00132 }
00133 
00134 void FilterLogView::slotButtonClicked( int button )
00135 {
00136   //save dialog size
00137   KConfigGroup configWindowSettings( config, CONFIG_GROUP );
00138   saveDialogSize( configWindowSettings );
00139 
00140   KDialog::slotButtonClicked( button );
00141 }
